title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 811.15 - Submission of final report and administrative review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 811.15 - Submission of final report and administrative review

State Regulations
(a) Upon completion of the comprehensive
study and report, the consultant shall submit copies thereof to the local
agency and to the commissioner for review. Such final report shall be prefaced
with a brief summary listing the findings, conclusions, and recommendations
resulting from the comprehensive study. (b) Following receipt of the local agency's
written statement that the report is in satisfactory fulfillment of the
contract, the commissioner shall: (1)

Review
the report and ascertain that it fulfills all legal and technical
requirements. (2)

Approve or
disapprove the report as soon as practicable. (3)

If disapproved, notify the local agency
in writing of the reasons for such disapproval with suggestions on action
needed to meet the objections raised. (4)

If approved, notify the local agency in
writing and certify for final payment of State aid. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
811.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
